scrambleShrimp.name: Scramble with shrimp and hoisin cream
scrambleShrimp.desc: Delicate scrambled eggs with butter, juicy shrimp with a hint of garlic, and a tangy hoisin cream. Served with a mix of greens in a honey-balsamic dressing, cherry tomatoes, and a brioche bun

benedictBacon.name: Benedict with bacon and hollandaise sauce
benedictBacon.desc: Delicate English muffin with poached eggs, crispy bacon, and airy hollandaise sauce with a hint of nutmeg. Served with a mix of greens and spicy arugula in a honey-balsamic dressing and cherry tomatoes

montenegrianBreakfast.name: Montenegrian breakfast
montenegrianBreakfast.desc: Hearty Balkan-style set: grilled sausages, sunny-side-up eggs, crispy bacon, young potatoes in garlic oil, and farmhouse cheese.

pancakesHoney.name: Pancakes with honey and seasonal fruits
pancakesHoney.desc: Pancakes with honey and fresh fruits.

chiaPudding.name: Chia pudding
chiaPudding.desc: Chia pudding with homemade granola and nuts (cherry or strawberry of your choice).

oatmeal.name: Oatmeal
oatmeal.desc: Oatmeal with baked pear mousse and caramelized hazelnuts.

chickenSandwich.name: Chicken sandwich
chickenSandwich.desc: Sous-vide chicken sandwich with homemade mayonnaise.

frenchToast.name: French toast
frenchToast.desc: French toast with seasonal fruits and cherry sauce.

bruschettaPear.name: Bruschetta with marinated pear, gorgonzola sauce, and smoked salmon
bruschettaPear.desc: A delicate combination of sweet pear with a hint of wine, tangy gorgonzola cream with basil, and tender house-cured smoked salmon.

bruschettaSquid.name: Bruschetta with squid, hoisin cream, and chuka seaweed
bruschettaSquid.desc: Exotic bruschetta with squid, marinated chukka seaweed, mildly sweet hoisin cream, paprika oil and marinated edamame beans

bruschettaBeef.name: Bruschetta with roast beef and aioli cream
bruschettaBeef.desc: Juicy roast beef on a crispy toast with a smooth cream rich in roasted garlic aroma, spicy arugula, whole grain mustard, and parmesan

carpaccioBeef.name: Beef carpaccio with roasted peach
carpaccioBeef.desc: Tender slices of beef combined with fragrant peach and a balsamic-based dressing.

saladRoastBeef.name: Salad with roast beef, roasted bell pepper, and pimento sauce
saladRoastBeef.desc: A salad mix with homemade roast beef, dressed with a sauce made from roasted peppers, sun-dried tomatoes, cilantro, honey and grated roasted walnut.

saladSeafood.name: Seafood salad with coconut dressing
saladSeafood.desc: Young squid and fresh shrimp with a salad mix in a coconut-lime dressing based on mascarpone and paprika oil

saladVegetable.name: Seasonal vegetable salad with Pomorosso dressing
saladVegetable.desc: A mix of seasonal vegetables with a signature sun-dried tomato-based dressing. The freshness of the vegetables is balanced by delicate farmhouse feta cheese and piquant notes of the dressing.

soupFish.name: Fish soup with seafood
soupFish.desc: A rich signature-style soup with cilantro and parsley oil, squid, shrimp, and salmon.

soupBeetroot.name: Cold beetroot soup with kefir and baby potatoes
soupBeetroot.desc: Refreshing cold kefir-based soup with beetroot, presented in a signature style. Served with sautéed young potatoes.

risottoPurple.name: Purple risotto with meatballs and parmesan sauce
risottoPurple.desc: A vibrant dish with veal meatballs, prepared using the classic risotto technique and served with a rich cheese sauce.

risottoMushroom.name: Risotto with porcini mushrooms
risottoMushroom.desc: Creamy risotto in a mushroom broth with porcini mushrooms, parmesan, and dill oil.

risottoTomYum.name: Tom Yum risotto with shrimp and squid
risottoTomYum.desc: An Asian twist on a classic Italian recipe with squid and shrimp. Infused with coconut notes, lime and the tang of Tom Yum.

fishDorado.name: Grilled dorado with vegetable sauté
fishDorado.desc: Tender grilled dorado paired with a crispy sauté of seasonal vegetables.

fishSeaBass.name: Sea bass fillet with celery root cream and Basoro sauce
fishSeaBass.desc: Tender sea bass fillet, pan-seared to a golden crust, served on a velvety celery cream with refined Basoro sauce made from white wine, orange, and aromatic spices. Marinated fennel adds the necessary freshness to the dish.

fishSalmon.name: Bourbon salmon
fishSalmon.desc: Tender salmon fillet with mashed potatoes and a sweet-and-sour sauce made from bourbon, honey, and chili pepper.

meatBeefMedallions.name: Beef medallions with mashed potatoes and porcini mushroom sauce
meatBeefMedallions.desc: Juicy beef medallions with tender mashed potatoes and a rich creamy sauce made from aromatic wild mushrooms and thyme.

meatChicken.name: Sous-vide chicken with egg noodles and anise teriyaki sauce
meatChicken.desc: Juicy sous-vide chicken fillet served with egg noodles in a signature anise teriyaki sauce.

meatPork.name: Pork tenderloin with young potatoes and mashroom sauce
meatPork.desc: Tender, juicy pork with roasted young potatoes. Served with mushroom sauce.

meatPljeskavitsa.name: Signature Pljeskavitsa
meatPljeskavitsa.desc: A Balkan classic made from a blend of beef and spices, grilled to perfection. Served with homemade pickles and French fries.

dessertBrownie.name: Brownie with dulce de leche cream and caramelized hazelnuts
dessertBrownie.desc: Rich chocolate brownie with the most delicate cream made from boiled condensed milk, soaked cherries, and caramelized hazelnuts.

dessertTiramisu.name: Tiramisu
dessertTiramisu.desc: A classic Italian dessert. Airy mascarpone cream with notes of lime and orange, sponge cake soaked in coffee and amaretto.
